asset.name: ARGX-124
asset.one_liner: ARGX-124 is an FcRn-targeting molecule in Phase 1, part of argenx's strategy to build a diversified FcRn franchise with 3 clinical-stage molecules.

biology.simple_explanation: Third FcRn molecule in argenx portfolio after efgartigimod and ARGX-213, contributing to enduring FcRn leadership strategy.

why_good_target.clinical_validation: Efgartigimod (same target) approved with $4.2B in 2025 sales
